name: Warhordling Orc Eye
description: A medium humanoid with a strong presence on the battlefield, the Warhordling Orc Eye wields a mace and possesses cleric abilities that enhance its combat effectiveness.
memorable: Combines aggressive melee abilities with potent spellcasting, providing healing and offensive capabilities.
goals: Engage in combat while supporting allies with healing and spells.
relations: May serve under stronger orc leaders or work with other humanoid allies.
environment: Commonly found in battlefields or locations of conflict.
strengths: Good Wisdom for healing and Insight skills, as well as effective spellcasting.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity limits its agility in combat.
attacks: Melee mace attack with added radiant damage from spell slots; ranged attacks like Guiding Bolt and Sacred Flame.
most_powerful_ability: Spirit Guardians can control the battlefield and damage enemies within its radius.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect unseen foes nearby.
skills: Outstanding in medicine and insight, aiding in both healing and battlefield awareness.
additional_information: Aggressive Charge for closing distance to enemies.
5th-level spellcaster with a variety of clerical spells.
Can grant advantage on attacks against marked targets with Guiding Bolt.
Healing Word for quick, on-the-field healing of allies.
Spirit Guardians creates difficult terrain while dealing damage.
spellcasting: 5th-level cleric with spells focused on attack and support, including Healing Word, Spirit Guardians, and Dispel Magic.
test_queries: humanoid with blindsight and aggressive tactics
support character that uses spirit guardians
creature with strong medicine and insight skills
orc that can cast guiding bolt and healing word
